00004 #include "../stream.hpp"
00005 #include <iostream>

00008 namespace Mangle {
00009 namespace Stream {
00010 
00013 class StdStream : public Stream
00014 {
00015   std::istream *inf;
00016 
00017   static void fail(const std::string &msg)
00018   { throw std::runtime_error("StdStream: " + msg); }
00019 
00020  public:
00021  StdStream(std::istream *_inf)
00022    : inf(_inf)
00023   {
00024     isSeekable = true;
00025     hasPosition = true;
00026     hasSize = true;
00027   }
00028 
00029   size_t read(void* buf, size_t len)
00030   {
00031     inf->read((char*)buf, len);
00032     if(inf->bad())
00033       fail("error reading from stream");
00034     return inf->gcount();
00035   }
00036 
00037   void seek(size_t pos)
00038   {
00039     inf->clear();
00040     inf->seekg(pos);
00041     if(inf->fail())
00042       fail("seek error");
00043   }
00044 
00045   size_t tell() const
00046   // Hack around the fact that ifstream->tellg() isn't const
00047   { return ((StdStream*)this)->inf->tellg(); }
00048 
00049   size_t size() const
00050   {
00051     // Use the standard iostream size hack, terrible as it is.
00052     std::streampos pos = inf->tellg();
00053     inf->seekg(0, std::ios::end);
00054     size_t res = inf->tellg();
00055     inf->seekg(pos);
00056 
00057     if(inf->fail())
00058       fail("could not get stream size");
00059 
00060     return res;
00061   }
00062 
00063   bool eof() const
00064   { return inf->eof(); }
00065 };
00066 
00067 typedef boost::shared_ptr<StdStream> StdStreamPtr;
